explains: adj. 灵巧的，有独创性的；精巧的，巧妙的

sentences.en: You must have managed to escape, you clever, ingenious, intelligent Toad!
sentences.cn: 你一定是设法逃出来的，你这聪明机灵的癞蛤蟆！

sentences.en: His smartness of the morning had seemed to Tom a good joke before, and very ingenious.
sentences.cn: 汤姆之前觉得他早上耍的小聪明是个很好的笑话，而且很有独创性。

sentences.en: It is the starting point to which the theorist returns after every ingenious excursion.
sentences.cn: 它是理论家在每一次巧妙的旅行之后返回的出发点。
